choices: Danganronpa 3: The End of Hope’s Peak Academy
1.content:
Ken Nakagawa is the ultimate scientist. He came into fame recently with his newly created shrinking serum. He can be two ways depending on which choice. Either a hopeful person or insane with a lust for despair.


Now then, to start this story what Danganronpa media does this storyline take place in?

Pick a choice, then pick if the main character is on the side of hope or despair~.
1.title: Danganronpa

11.content:
Ken Nakagawa wasn't prepared for what his school life would become.

When he arrived at Hope's Peak Academy, Ken didn't consider that he would be knocked out and awaken to find that his headmaster would be a psychotic bear and tell them that they were to kill each other.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The group of students looked as thier supposed headmaster giggled evilly at thier predicament. However, he wasn't finished.

"Now then, to finish this off. I'll give one last surprise!", Monokuma excitingly yelled.

The students widened thier eyes, as the bear drew a dart gun. It aimed in the direction of the student Makoto Naegi. The yellow dart was shot and zoomed past the students who looked back in shock. The dart missed Makoto's head by an inch...

And hit Ken.

The blacknette fell onto the floor, dart embitted in his shoulder.

"PUPUPUPU~, have fun Kenny~", Monkuma taunted before vanishing.

Makoto keeled down in worry next to Ken. Despite just meeting the boy, he still was worried. He noted quickly however that Ken's body seem to be getting.....smaller.

The ultimates watched in confusion as Ken dwindled down, eventually reaching a inch. Opening his eyes, Ken looked up shocked as Makoto loomed over him as a giant.

...........

"AHHHHHH!"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The students soon adjusted to thier imprisonment. Ken had the most difficulty doing so.

Walking around took hours. When he arrived for breakfast, all that was left was scraps.

Traveling around the school was a challenge when he was this size. Almost all walks had him against the wall when his classmates passed. He'd nearly been flattened, but luckily Hagakure's sandals were elevated.

Makoto would luckily see him and gently carry him where ever he needed to go.

Togami would pay little attention. He missed stepping on him by an inch and would scoff and tell Ken not to spoil his shoes.

Ishimaru was strict. If Ken was late, he would scold him regardless of his size.

Ken sighed, wondering what he was in for today.

It seemed Ken was going to encounter......
11.title: Danganronpa: Trigger Happy Havoc

114.content:
Ken cursed as he ran, only covering a few feet in a minute. The curfew was almost upon him and he was far from his room. After what that bear did to him, Ken didn't want to risk disobeying the rules.

"Maybe someone can help me.", the Ultimate Scientist thought stopping in front of a door. He couldn't see the sign of who the inhabitant was, but It was worth a try. Climbing under the door, Ken picked up the smell of sweat and the sounds of grunting.

Across the room was the room's inhabitant, the Ultimate Gang Leader Mondo Owada.The muscled teen was shirtless and doing push ups, making his tan muscles bulge and drip sweat. His pompadour was slightly messy.

Eventually Mondo stopped and stood up, wiping the sweat from his forehead. Grabbing a towel to wipe his strong chest, he made his way over to where Ken was standing. The ground shook for the tiny as the large white shoes stomped the floor.

Ken clenched his teeth. He needed to get his classmate's attention or who knows what will happen. Looking up, Ken gasped as he saw Mondo's piercing eyes looking directly at him from where he stood a few feet away.

Mondo saw.....
114.title: Mondo

choices: The butt stopped its descent suddenly
1142.content:
Mondo gained a pissed off look as he saw the speck by his door. "How the hell did a bug get in here?"

Ken gulped as he heard those words, watching the biker throw the towel over his shoulder and stomp over all while cracking his knuckles. The tiny watched as the titanic teen loomed over him and sneered over his muscled chest down at him.

"Alright you little bastard, you wanna come in here i'll give you a warm welcome!", Mondo barked as he clenched his fists and brought up his right foot, covering Ken in a shadow while filling his sky with his white sole.

"IT'S CRUSHIN TIME!"

Saying that the shoe was brought down at full speed, within a second Ken quickly jumped to the left, getting blasted away by the excessive force of Mondo's stomp. The biker swiveled his foot but stopped at the lack of a crunch. Bringing his shoe up, Mondo saw the absence of a red splat before catching the moving speck getting away.

"Grrr..quick huh? Well try and outrun this!", Mondo growled before bringing his knee up to his chest and leaning forward into his next stomp. Ken manage to hop out of the shadow of the foot and get blasted away further. Mondo meanwhile smirked before leaning onto his stomper wanting to hear the satisfying crunch, but stopped and widened his eyes as he saw the speck fleeing again.

"EH?! STAY THE FUCK STILL SO I CAN CRUSH YOU!"

Mondo continued his stomping assault, always missing ken by a hair. More sweat dripped down his body, both from moving so much and the seething rage he felt at not being able to smash a (to him) bug.

Ken wasn't doing too well. He was getting tired and Mondo seem to just stomp more. thinking of a new strategy, Ken ran over to Mondo's bed and started climbing the covers. He wished he had Makoto's luck right now. Hopefully he could hide in the bed until Mondo lost interest.

Mondo however saw the speck crawling up towards his bed and smirked. "Alright you little fucker, i'll play dirty."

Ken managed to make it on top of the bed. looking around, he tried to find a fold he could maybe hide in. He stopped when the area around him darkened. Looking up, at the sight before him his jaw dropped.

Mondo's backside was looming over him. HIs thick thighs, firm rear, and muscled back. The gang leader smirked widely over his shoulder down at him.

"Alright you fucking pest, i'm about to show you a real man's weight!"

The tan giant's knees bent and his large ass stretched his pants before completely filling Ken's sky. The scientist panicked as the rump seem to come down in slow motion. he needed to jump away or else he'll become a stain under a biker's ass!

Ken soon turned around, jumped and..........
1142.title: A bug

115.content: Here are some more options.
115.title: Other

1153.content: Here's the last of them.
1153.title: Other

12.content:
On a remote tropical island seventeen students believe it to be a tropical get away trip for thier school. Guided by a pink bunny they are told that they simply need to have a good time and become closer as friends.

Little did they know, one student actually knew why they were here. It sickened him that the so-called Ultimate Hope would try to get rid of his lust for despair. Ken Nakagawa the Ultimate Scientist would put a end to this, but first he was going to have some fun.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The boy sat with his other classmates eating. While he was smiling, on the inside he was smirking as he gazed at the male students. What despair could he cause? Perhaps the horror of finding him beneath thier shoes or maybe shrink them himself?

"Nakagawa-kun?"

"Huh?", looking to his side, Ken found Hinata-kun looking at him cornered.

Thinking about shrinking and all that he could do was making his face turn red. He simply offered a fake smile. "Oh I'm ok, it's just a little warm!"

Hinata nodded before turning away. Ken smirked, tonight was going to be full of pleasure. The boy squeezed his legs as he felt his front stiffen.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
As night rolled around and everyone went to thier rooms for the night, Ken prepared himself.

In the span of time it took from lunch to now he managed to create his shrinking serum. Slipping out of his room, he made his way to the guy he'd chosen to be his giant.

That man was.......
12.title: Danganronpa 2: Goodbye Despair

13.content:
Now pick which side the main character is on.

Hope
- Ken Nakagawa is a member of the Future Foundation. The ultimate Scientist is responsible for using his newly created shrinking serum to capture possible allies of the Remnants of Despair. Unfortunately an accident happens as he takes the shrunken humans to interrogation.

Despair
- Brainwashed by the large wave of despair, Ken Nakagwa used his talent to partake in the sea of senseless violence. Using his shrinking serums he managed to stay under the radar until his capture.

Now, what side is Ken on?
13.title: Danganronpa 3: The End of Hope’s Peak Academy

131.content:
Ken was making his way down the Future Foundation halls, on his way to the interrogation room. In his hands was a insect case, with what appeared to bugs inside. However, looking closer you could see that the "bugs" were in fact tiny humans.

The young adult was known as The Ultimate Scientist. He was responsible in creating a serum capable of shrinking human beings down to half a inch tall. Immediately Ken received numerous companies in favor of purchasing his research for the benefits of mankind. The man was put off by this, if his invention was sold what were the chances of it being used for war or illegal purposes?

The serum gained a purpose when the tragedy happened. Ken gained a job at Future Foundation, he had the task of shrinking possible Remnants of Despair and capturing them. Most cases ended the same, the shrunken humans were found guilty and executed. While he didn't know the process, Ken always saw Munakata changing his shoes before the execution.

Ken was brought out of his thoughts when he felt his face suddenly hit a wall. Opening his eyes he saw the "wall" was in fact a pair of large pecs and that they belonged to Juzo Sakakura, The Ultimate Boxer.

"Oh! Pardon me Sakakura-kun!", Ken nervously bowed his head at the much taller man. Juzo gave a grunt in response, before his eyes trailed down to the case.

"So those the new Remnets?", the boxer asked as he grinned slyly at the case. Ken gave a nod in response.

Juzo bended over bringing his face to the glass wall. Inside multiple adults were thrashing around, some had monokuma heads while others looked pure insane. All of the shrunken humans had a elastic band wrapped around them, so they didn't kill each other. Juzo smirked as he watched them, before standing back up.

"Ya know Nakagawa, I could take these bugs off your hand for you. I'm sure I can SQUEEZE the truth outta them."

Ken gulped. "I-i'm sorry Sakakura-kun, I was instructed to deliver them."

"Hn, alright get them to interrogation. I'm sure thier dying to get a taste.", Juzo slyly said as he walked off.

Ken sighed before continuing down the hall. The short Ultimate soon arrived at the room in question. Opening the door, he was greeted by a pale green room with a single table and chairs. Walking over to the table, Ken placed the case down. He looked down at the inhabitants in the case.

"It be best you talk, they don't hold back when it comes to getting information. I don't know what they do, but i can hear thumps from outside when they do it."

Ken felt the need to prepare these prisoners somehow. That's all he could hope.

However as he placed his hands in his lab coat he felt a sudden...

CRACK

Pulling his hand out in horror, Ken looked as the shrinking serum drenched his hand. His body began to tingle and as he leaned against the table, his frame shrank in size, eventually coming to the size of the shrunken prisoners. Ken looked up in shock as he stood in front of the case.

This is bad if he get's caught, who knows what'll happen. Just as Ken moved the door suddenly opened, and the white haired Munakata came striding in now the size of a giant. He soon stepped to the side allowing the interrogator to enter.

He saw it was.......
131.title: Hope

132.content:
While most people who get interrogated usually sit at a table, Ken Nakagawa was sitting on the table in a bug case.

Ken Nakagawa was known in his high school days as the Ultimate Scientist, but now he is called an agent of despair. The boy made headlines with his creation of the shrinking serum. While this was a breakthrough, it would soon be put to vile uses when the tragedy occurred. Ken would shrink people down, thier last sight being his boot sole and his crazed grin. Even in the midst of the chaos he still made himself known to the Future Foundation.

After a good while of using his own serum and regrowth pills to hide from Future Foundation, he was finally caught and while shrunken for that matter. Which brings us to now.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Ken sat in his bug case looking up. On both sides of the prison were two giant pale hands. Connected to them were the sleeves of a white suit, and they went up to the head of Munakata Kyosuke the Ultimate Student Council President.

The white haired man looked down at Ken with his intense and stern gaze. "Speak now despair. If you confess everything then your fate may be slightly more pleasent."

Ken simply smirked up at Munakata, little did he know that rather it be despair or not the threat of being punished at this size only stimulated the tiny.

Munakata "tched" before standing up to loom over Ken more.

"The interrogation will begin shortly. No matter what you decide to do, by the end of all this my shoe will have a stain.", Munakata sneered down at the agent of despair before leaving the room, making sure to step extra hard in an attempt to intimidate him.

Ken bite his lips as he blushed. "Sh-shit! That was so...fuckin hot! Come on ultimate, hurry back so you can crush me!", he squeezed his legs as he panted and felt himself harden. He couldn't pleasure himself as his body was binded by a rubber band.

After a few minutes the door opened again as Ken's interrogater walked in. The tiny smirked as his blush deepened.

The person walking in was......
132.title: Despair

choices: Munakata goes to speak with Daisaku
1323.content:
The white suited giant re-entered the room. As with before Munakata added extra force to his steps, making his heels click loudly as he approached the table. Ken squeezed his legs tighter as the pale giant loomed over him again. With him this time was a tablet, setting it down Munkata sat in a chair and focused his stern gaze on the tiny.

"Now then agent, confess your crimes."

Ken tilted his head as he childishly grinned. "Hmmm, what crimes?"

Munakata kept his composure as he gazed at the tablet screen. "Ken Nakagawa, the Ultimate Scientist. Known for creating the shrinking serum. In the past mouth there have been thirty discoveries of corpses, cause of death: all flesh was flattened and bones were shattered. A connection between these deaths is that all corpses were only a inch in height."

Munakata placed the tablet down, looking at Ken with a more intense gaze. "Now then despair, confess your crimes."

"Say I do, what would happen?", Ken kept his childish attitude as he swayed side to side.

"If you confess to every murder you've done, then you shall be executed by lethal injection. However, if you hold off like this, then it was agreed you would recieve a fitting punishment.", Munakata explained

"Oh you would risk me staining your shoe~"

Munakata took a quick glance down at his dress shoe before narrowing his eyes at Ken.

"I don't mind if my shoes are stained, seeing you splattered on my sole would be all to pleasing."

Ken smirked before sighing. "Alright I'll confess."

Munakata picked up the tablet before nodding to signal Ken to start.

Ken brought up his leg, showing the treads of his boot. "This right here is my weapon, the serum was step one and this bad boy was step two.", placing both boot soles together, Ken looked off in reminisce.

"I remember when I was little. An ant had gotten into the house, and my father got rid if it. I always wondered how the ant felt, to have my father a giant raising his lofer over it and looking at it with only annoyance. Then when this tragedy began, I figured out what that ant felt. Fear.

When I shrunk down a drunk man vandalizing a car, he looked up at me with nothing but fear. I realized, when a large being has the ability to end your life with a step, all you can do is hope thier merciful. Once I started, I couldn't stop. They all looked up in fear at the big bad giant and his boot. I even tricked one of your own into doing it."

Munakata widened his eyes at this confession.

"Daisaku was his name right? Sweet guy huh? I shrunk down about twenty people, didn't touch them though. But I watched when he arrived wanting to give supplies. Didn't even look down, walking around confused as to where everyone was. It seems unreal, a sweet guy like that crushing them totally oblivious to why there were stains on his sandal. One even ran up to him, only to be stomped."

Munakata clenched his teeth. It was one thing when Ken did it, but making someone snuff out humans and not even know about it!

In the next moment, the white haired giant grabbed Ken in a fist. The tiny found himself being squeezed and then roughly thrown on the floor. Looking up at the pale giant, his front began to stiffen again.

Munakata stood up, clenching his fists and looking down at Ken with complete hatred. His right trouser leg then rose, bringing the foot with it. Ken looked as the black sole of the shoe loomed over him.

Munakata looked at the mere speck on the floor, one small step could reduce the agent to paste. His hands trembled from how hard he clenched them, he wanted to stomp on the man so badly. A weird feeling filled him, a sort of excitement. Right now, the man under him was a bug. He wanted to relish in the sound of his crunching body, to have him stuck to his sole.

Wait.

Munakata blinked. Where did those dark thoughts come from. Looking down, he still had his foot raised and Ken beneath him. He took a deep breath.

SLAM!

Ken's body bounced at the vibration. Rather then stomping him, Munakata placed his foot back next to the other. The pale giant then grabbed the back of the elastic band before dropping Ken back in the bug case.

The giant made his way to the door, stopping to look over his shoulder at Ken again with his signature gaze.

"I'll return shortly. We will finish this, and see if you end up under my shoe."

Ken once again was left alone. He panted as he replayed the events. That ultimate didn't seem have the highest control. Maybe he'd get his pleasure soon.

After some time
1323.title: Munakata himself

info.brief_description: Hope or Despair? Either way you end up up shrinking at Hope's Peak.
info.description:
Hey everyone! It's ya boy, back at it again with another interactive!

This time it's focused on the Video game/Anime Danganronpa.

Now then, before you proceed with the interactive I'm going to need to tell you that going into this story will spoil you on the Danganronpa games. If you don't want to be spoiled then go catch up and come back, if not then proceed.

I also have to give a disclaimer that this may have more mature content. Danganronpa is known for it's dark and violent moments, so the chapters may be more graphic.

So the way this interactive will work is I'm going to list the Danganronpa games and anime. Depending on which choice you pick, the protagonist could either be on the side of hope or despair. Some may have a option to pick, depending on the number of characters.

-With hope, the character will have a ultimate talent and like everyone wants to inspire hope for the future.

- With despair, the character will want nothing more then to submerg everyone in negative emotions and create chaos with his talent.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Ok onto the rules.

- Keep the micro interactions M/M. Now there will be female characters, but keep the macro/micro on the male characters.

- You can end the storyline, but don't do it abruptly. Keep the story going and try to make a happy or sad ending..

- Gore is allowed, this includes the main character dying.

- You can do what ever micro interaction you want, but please refrain from scat or piss.

Alright then, read on!

PUPUPUPUPUPUPUPUPU~
